    • Constructor Detail

      • DoubleRange

        public DoubleRange(double bound1,
                   double bound2)
        Constructs the range defined by given values. Minimum of range will be given by smaller of two values (if they differ) and maximum by larger.

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(double k)
        Indicates if a value falls within the range of this instance.
        Parameters:
        k - the tested value
        Returns:
        true if the given value between the range's minimum and maximum values, inclusive.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(DoubleRange range)
        Tests for equality of mininum and maximum values of this range with given range
        Parameters:
        range -
        Returns:
        true if minimum and maximum match.
